title: Mod Podge Super Thick Gloss (8-Ounce), CS11297
description: For over 50 years Mod Podge has been America's favorite glue, sealer, and finish. Mod Podge Super Gloss is a high-gloss, glass-like top coat. Preserve the beauty of your decoupage projects and more with this multi-purpose formula. Use this decoupage top coat to create decoupage tissue paper projects as well as projects using wood, fabric, plastic, and canvas! Let your creativity come alive with the limitless possibilities of Mod Podge Super Gloss.
